testCase.name: Quantity Utils safeDecrement should decrement normally when result is positive
Quantity Utils safeDecrement should return 0 when decrement exceeds current
Quantity Utils safeDecrement should handle undefined/null current values
Quantity Utils safeDecrement should default to decrement of 1
Quantity Utils safeIncrement should increment normally
Quantity Utils safeIncrement should default to increment of 1
Quantity Utils canDecrement should return true when sufficient quantity exists
Quantity Utils canDecrement should return false when insufficient quantity
Quantity Utils formatQuantity should format positive numbers correctly
Quantity Utils formatQuantity should handle zero and negative
Quantity Utils formatQuantity should handle undefined/null
Quantity Utils isValidQuantity should validate positive numbers
Quantity Utils isValidQuantity should reject negative numbers
Quantity Utils isValidQuantity should reject non-numbers
Inventory Count Merge Logic should merge by exact ID match
Inventory Count Merge Logic should merge by case-insensitive ID match
Inventory Count Merge Logic should merge by name match when IDs differ
Inventory Count Merge Logic should NOT create separate entries for the same item
Inventory Count Merge Logic should handle multiple placements correctly
